resources.string:
Cook your pasta until al dente 
Saute garlic in olive oil until fragrant 
Add cream cheese, pasta cooking water, parmesan, and stir well 
Drain and add pasta to the skillet 
Toss until well combined, adding some pasta water if needed

Add one and a half cups of water 
Add maggi noodles and boil it 
Add the maggi masala on to it 
Wait for 2 mins 
Maggi is ready!

Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) 
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl 
Add eggs, butter, and milk 
Mix until smooth 
Pour into a greased baking pan 
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean

Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl 
Add milk and eggs 
Mix until smooth 
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat 
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle 
Brown on both sides and serve hot

Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C) 
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface 
Spread tomato sauce over the dough 
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese 
Add basil and drizzle with olive oil 
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly

Preheat the grill to medium-high heat 
Season the ground beef with salt and pepper 
Form into patties 
Grill patties for 4-5 minutes per side or until desired doneness 
Assemble burgers with buns, lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese

Cut potatoes into strips 
Soak in water for 30 minutes 
Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375°F (190°C) 
Fry potatoes until golden brown 
Drain and season with salt
